name: 西洋文學導論：神話與傳奇
goals: to familiarize students with the main themes of Greek mythology, Greek drama, early Christian writings
to enable them to compare and contrast significant characters, events, symbols
familiarize students with the historical and cultural background of the texts studied
to give students some familiarity with the visual arts that depict the Bible and legends of Ancient Greece
syllabus: This seminar aims to familiarize students with recurrent themes and motifs in western literature through close reading of selected classics from the ancient period to the dawn of Continental Renaissance. A comparative approach will be applied to look into the cultural and historical contexts of the literary works so as to better orientate students to the study of British Literature and American Literature.
